name: Puny Humans (Jam Version)
description:
Puny Humans
-------------------

Originally an entry for the Weekly Game Jam #182, the theme was "Cthulhu"

If the browser version doesn't run well, you can try download an executable instead.

-------------------

[Minion] Sire, the're back.

[Cthulhu] Just say I will destroy them tomorrow, I need more sleep.

[Minion]  It looks like the entire navy, they are out for blood. They know we are weak.

[Cthulhu] Fine... let's show them the backdoor as quickly as possible.

-------------------
[Tutorial]
Click anywhere on the sea to send any free minions.

The objective is to destroy all ships before they get to you, this is not coded in yet so you may also invent your own rules ;)

Buy upgrades to suit your minions with the money you get from destroying ships, I deeply recommend buying the priest-o-gone as soon as you destroy the first ship because without it you won't get any new minions.

This is only a prototype, so please comment any suggestions and bugs :)
